banner.heading: Hi, I'm
banner.name: Molly Su
banner.description: A front-end developer who enjoys solving problems and is passionate about learning new technologies.

about.title: About Me
about.description:
I'm Molly Su. I graduated with a bachelor's degree in information and financial management from National Taipei University of Technology.
I'm passionate about front-end development because it allows me to express my creativity and see results quickly.
I enjoy taking on complex and challenging projects and am eager to contribute my skills and learn from real-world experience to enhance my proficiency in front-end development.

25sprout.title: 25sprout
content: Use React and TypeScript to fix bugs in SurveyCake enterprise dashboard.
Use React, TypeScript, Redux and Nivo to assist in developing SurveyCake XM.
Learn Git for collaborative development and version control.

mrhost.title: mrhost
content: Automate Google Sheets workflows using Apps Script.
Use SiteMinder‚Äôs PMS to manage hotel information, room types, and prices.

Create SOPs to ensure the accuracy and consistency of daily workflows.

stocklight.title: Stock Light ‚ú®
stocklight.subtitle: Senior Project
stocklight.description:
A one-stop stock information platform that uses historical data and statistical analysis, wrapped in a "Light Up" blessing system. It integrates deep learning analysis to provide users with instant and straightforward analysis and reports for individual stocks. I was mainly responsible for frontend development, including UI/UX design, and worked closely with the backend team to define API formats and assist with integration.

Key features include:
features: Fundamental and technical analysis for individual stocks, and weather correlation analysis.
God of Stock Market AI Chatbot
Lighting System: After selecting an industry category, the system filters and identifies the most promising stocks within that sector.

Individual Stock Dashboard: Includes financial ratios, sentiment score radar charts based on textual analysis, key chart information, related news, and AI chatbot powered by GPT-4 and Retrieval-Augmented Generation (RAG) technology.
Watchlist: Users can create groups and add stocks of interest to track real-time prices, changes, and related analysis.

mern-ec-website.title: E-commerce Website üõí
mern-ec-website.subtitle: MERN Stack Project
mern-ec-website.description:
A full stack e-commerce website using MERN stack.
 The frontend allows users to browse products, place orders, and view their order history (without payment integration for now).
 The backend provides admin capabilities for adding, deleting, and editing products, managing messages and orders, and viewing all customers' order information.
